+++ 
@@ -1,10 +1,13 @@
-CREATE FUNCTION util.metadataGetColumnsId(@object NVARCHAR(128) = NULL)
+CREATE FUNCTION util.metadataGetColumns(@object NVARCHAR(128) = NULL)
 RETURNS TABLE
 AS
 RETURN(
-	SELECT DISTINCT 
-		c.column_id columnId
+	SELECT 
+        c.object_id objectId,
+        OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(c.object_id) schemaName,
+        OBJECT_NAME(c.object_id) objectName,
+        c.column_id columnId,
+        c.name columnName
 	FROM sys.columns c
-		INNER JOIN sys.objects o ON c.object_id = o.object_id
-	WHERE (@object IS NULL OR o.object_id = ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(INT, @object), OBJECT_ID(@object)))
+	WHERE (@object IS NULL OR c.object_id = ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(INT, @object), OBJECT_ID(@object)))
 );

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
CREATE FUNCTION util.metadataGetColumnsId(@object NVARCHAR(128) = NULL)
RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN(
	SELECT DISTINCT 
		c.column_id columnId
	FROM sys.columns c
		INNER JOIN sys.objects o ON c.object_id = o.object_id
	WHERE (@object IS NULL OR o.object_id = ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(INT, @object), OBJECT_ID(@object)))
);
